mapper.select: /* query id : alExam.web.sv.TrgterExamMResultDtls.examMResultDtls description : MMSE-DS 검사 결과지 검사 내용 */ SELECT T1.EXAM_ITEM_CD ,T1.EXAM_ITEM_CD_DTLS ,T1.POINT ,T2.TOT_POINT FROM TN_SV_EXAM_RESULT T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT TOT_POINT ,EXAM_NO FROM TN_SV_EXAM_REQ ) T2 ON T1.EXAM_NO = T2.EXAM_NO WHERE T1.EXAM_NO = #{EXAM_NO} order by EXAM_ITEM_CD asc, TO_NUMBER(EXAM_ITEM_CD_DTLS) asc
mapper.update: /* query id : alExam.web.sv.TrgterExamMResultDtls.insertMmseTotPoint description : MMSE-DS 총 점수 입력 */ UPDATE TN_SV_EXAM_REQ SET TOT_POINT = #{TOT_POINT} , EXAM_CMP_DATE = DECODE(EXAM_REQ_DATE,NULL,'', SUBSTR(EXAM_REQ_DATE,1,4)|| SUBSTR(EXAM_REQ_DATE,5,2)|| SUBSTR(EXAM_REQ_DATE,7,2)) WHERE EXAM_NO = #{EXAM_NO}
/* query id : alExam.web.sv.trgterexamlresultinsert.MSttsChange description : 진행상태 변경 */ UPDATE TN_SV_EXAM_REQ SET EXAM_STTUS = '03' WHERE EXAM_NO = #{EXAM_NO}
